scrape.title: The dinner
scrape.author: RoseMary Achey
scrape.text:
Two brothers and their wives meet one Saturday evening over dinner to discuss their teenage boys. During the course of the dinner we learn that the boys have committed a horrible act. The families are widely divided on how the situation should be handled.
I have always maintained that there are many folks walking around in our society that are crazyâ€¦.that should be wither medicated or in a hospital. This book clearly demonstrates this supposition.
